Today in North Devon, expect fun 4 ft @ 10s WSW swell with fresh 15 mph SSE winds. Good spots like Porlock Weir and Lynmouth are working well, especially during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell builds to 5 ft @ 13s WSW with moderate 12 mph WNW winds, keeping it clean and exciting at places like Croyde Beach and Woolacombe. Day after, conditions improve further with 4 ft @ 12s WSW and light 8 mph SE winds, making for a great surf day at sheltered spots. Best: day after.
